name: Alita_Robot
description: Alita is a Telegram Group management bot made using gotgbot and Go, which makes it modern and faster than most of the Telegram chat managers.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your telegram bot token, get from @Botfather in telegram.

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: Event logs channel where bot will send updates. Starts with -100

ENABLED_LOCALES.description: Locales enabled for your bot (e.g., 'en' or 'en,es,fr').

REDIS_PASSWORD.description: Password for your Redis instance (leave empty if no password).

USE_WEBHOOKS.description: Whether to use webhooks or not (true/false).
